channel.title: Combined Politepol Feed
channel.description: Merged feed from multiple Politepol sources

item.title: India's richest civic body goes to the BJP. Why this matters
Meet ‘Morticia Addams’, the woman who first set Khamenei’s photo on fire and started a movement
In Graphics | Can Trump keep the Nobel Peace Prize given to him by Venezuela's Machado?
In Charts | Why Venezuela's oil production declined rapidly over past decade
Who is Aliyah Rahman, a techie forcefully dragged out of car by ICE in Minneapolis?
India to be home of world’s largest museum by year-end. What we know of Yuge Yugeen Bharat Museum
Why stability in Venezuela is essential even for the US
item.description: It is only a stable Venezuela which would be able to meet President Trump’s intent of re-permitting US players to enter the Venezuelan oil game. Instability, compelling Washington to push boots on the ground, would be the reverse

item.title: Why investigation of Jerome Powell signals a deeper threat to US Fed
item.description: Beyond economics, the episode of the criminal investigation against the Federal Reserve Chair is revealing of contemporary American politics. It highlights the erosion of informal institutional norms that have historically complemented formal law

item.title: Moor’s last sigh: The grand strategy behind Trump’s Venezuela raid and Greenland grab
item.description: President Donald Trump’s coercive actions might be the hegemon’s final throw of the dice to bend to its will a system that is slowly going out of America’s control

item.title: How Khamenei regime’s economic failures are bringing about its fall
item.description: Bazaar merchants and the agrarian class, traditionally loyalists of the regime, have joined the anti-regime movement. Massive corruption and the IRGC officials’ mafia-like control over the economy have led to resentment among the business class

item.title: Pakistan’s arms exports: Not an economic breakthrough, but a narrative project
item.description: Pakistan’s sale of JF-17 aircraft and other systems is not a transient burst of export activity, but a deliberate effort to convert battlefield narratives into strategic capital

item.title: China in Africa: Lessons for Delhi from Beijing’s Long Game in the Global South
item.description: It would be unfair to compare the roles of the two Asian powers, as India and China differ markedly in perspective and capability. Nevertheless, China’s extensive engagement with Africa offers valuable lessons for India
